title: Man, 81, rescued after going into cardiac arrest while swimming
content:
— An 81-year-old man was rescued Monday evening after going into cardiac arrest while swimming in a pool at a senior living community on Friendship Road.

Authorities arrived at the Gatherings of East Greenwich senior community at about 5:15 p.m. where the man had already been pulled from the pool. Officials said someone trained in first aid had already begun CPR.

The man was transported to Inspira Medical Center Woodbury. MORE: Authorities from the East Greenwich Police Department and responders from the Gloucester County EMS and East Greenwich Fire Department all responded to the scene.
